PropertyBag.Description: Child of a conference. There is one child of this type for each connection, or leg, of the conference..
PropertyBag.Name: InterCallConnection

Property.Description: tax country amount in GBL currency
Property.Name: bridge_gbl_tax_amt

Property.Description: Bridge id. Driven through a config table in CAS.
Property.Name: bridge_id

Property.Description: Bridge Name. Driven though a config table in CAS.
Property.Name: bridge_number

Property.Description: Alternative resplus amount for USF for the bridge amount. Per minute rate.
Property.Name: bridge_r_rate

Property.Description: Alternative resplus amount for USF for the bridge amount. Rate currency.
Property.Name: bridge_r_rate_amt

Property.Description: derived rate used to calculate the amount
Property.Name: bridge_rate

Property.Description: Indicates if a call was a reconnect. Y=Reconnect, N=other
Property.Name: call_reconnect

Property.Description: 1 - Inbound. 2 Outbound. The base product rate can be different for inbound / outbound calls. This is used in the rate lookup criteria.
Property.Name: call_type

Property.Description: Leg level sub conference type, based on header level conf sub type and bridge type.
Property.Name: conf_sub_type

Property.Description: Leg level conference type, based on header level conf type and bridge type.
Property.Name: conf_type

Property.Description: The country part of the surcharge code.
Property.Name: country

Property.Description: The charge assoicated with the event which may summarize other charges within the event.The amount can be negative to represent a credit.
Property.Name: EventCharge

Property.Description: Time when the record was inserted in the UDR Table
Property.Name: extract_date

Property.Description: Folo duration. Calculated based on the conference duration and are also applying minimum connect time logic.
Property.Name: folo_duration

Property.Description: Determines if the call is international. 1 = Domestic, 0 = Intl
Property.Name: intl_call

Property.Description: tax country amount in GBL currency
Property.Name: leg_gbl_tax_amt

Property.Description: derived rate used to calculate the amount
Property.Name: leg_rate

Property.Description: The number type part of the surcharge code.
Property.Name: number_type

Property.Description: Stores the per second rating method flag that was used to determine the rate duration
Property.Name: persecond_rating_method

Property.Description: Code to identify the product. Always either P or P8 Billing Code. It will always contain the Premium type billing code of Base Billing Code.
Property.Name: premium_bill_code

Property.Description: Product Type is a short string to identify the call type (Operator assisted or Automated etc) that the app uses for feature rating and display on the billing files
Property.Name: prod_type

Property.Description: The product part of the rate_bill_code
Property.Name: product

Property.Description: The bill_code used for rating. This is either the base_bill_code or the premium_bill_code
Property.Name: rate_bill_code

Property.Description: The duration used for rating, one of the 4 durations in the connection.
Property.Name: rate_duration

Property.Description: The end time used for rating, one of the 4 end times in the connection.
Property.Name: rate_end_time

Property.Description: Indicates whether the premium bill code should be considered or not.
Property.Name: rate_flag

Property.Description: The start time used for rating, one of the 4 start times in the connection.
Property.Name: rate_start_time

Property.Description: Need more description around this one . . .
Property.Name: rebill_flag

Property.Description: Remote Bridge id is used for reporting. IS there a finite set of bridges??
Property.Name: remote_bridge_id

Property.Description: Reservation Id, unique id for a conference.
Property.Name: res_id

Property.Description: country codeActually SURCHARGE_CODE X ITFS Rate will be picked based on this code. Actually SURCHARGE_CODE. ITFS Rate will be picked based on this code.
Property.Name: surcharge_code

Property.Description: tax country amount in GBL currency
Property.Name: surcharge_gbl_tax_amt

Property.Description: derived rate used to calculate the amount
Property.Name: surcharge_rate

Property.Description: ISO country code for the taxable country for this record.
Property.Name: tax_cntry

Property.Description: tax country amount in GBL currency
Property.Name: telecom_gbl_tax_amt

Property.Description: derived rate used to calculate the amount
Property.Name: telecom_rate

Property.Description: The transport part of the rate_bill_code.
Property.Name: transport
